Description: Papyrus sheet bearing 16 lines of Greek text on the recto and an address on the verso. The text on the recto contains a letter from Heraclius to his children Theon and Sarapias announcing his safe arrival to Schedia.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Prof Bernard Pyne Grenfell
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (31810) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/31810)
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Colgate Rochester Divinity School
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: P.Oxy. XIV 1768 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
